Label: Copies sold
Description: Free text detailing the number of copies already sold, eg for a new paperback, the copies sold in hardback. Optional, and repeatable if parallel text is provided in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <CopiesSold>, but must be included in each instance if <CopiesSold> is repeated.
Format: Variable length text, suggested maximum length 200 characters. XHTML is enabled in this element – see Using XHTML, HTML, XML, JSON within ONIX text fields
Example: <CopiesSold>6400 copies sold of this edition in hardback</CopiesSold>
